label: logicA:agriculture_en
steps: [1] If we apply nitrogen fertilizer, then leaf chlorophyll increases.
[2] If leaf chlorophyll increases, then grain yield rises.
[3] For every field x, if x has soil pH below 5.5, then x requires liming.
[4] Field Alpha has soil pH below 5.5.
[9] Thus grain yield rises and Field Alpha requires liming.
